title: [Bug]: v1.13.x cannot join meetings
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

when joining a meeting, I can enter the room and see the participants on the right and the one talking in the middle, but: no sound and people do not see me in. one-to-one calls work both ways. reverting to 1.12.8 fixed this

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

1.13.0, 1.13.1

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. join a meeting
2.
3.
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
